UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the Streak Keeper app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity. Matches Firebase Auth UID.

currentStreak.description: The user's current streak (number of consecutive days).

lastActivityDate.description: The date of the last recorded activity.

badges.description: A list of badge IDs the user has earned.

DailyProgress.title: DailyProgress
DailyProgress.description: Represents a user's daily progress and learning activities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DailyProgress entry.

date.description: The date of the progress entry.

progress.description: The hours of progress made on that date.

activity.description: Description of the learning activities performed on this day.

subject.description: The subject studied during this activity.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores the main user profile document.

/users/{userId}/progress/{progressId}.description: Stores daily progress entries for a specific user.
